{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++23|
constexpr /*iterator*/&amp; operator++();
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++23|
constexpr /*iterator*/ operator++(int);
}}
{{dcl|num=3|since=c++23|
constexpr /*iterator*/&amp; operator--() requires ranges::bidirectional_range&lt;V&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=4|since=c++23|
constexpr /*iterator*/ operator--(int) requires ranges::bidirectional_range&lt;V&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Increments or decrements the {{rlp|iterator}}.

Let 
{{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}},
{{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}}, and
{{rlpi|/#Data members|next_}} be the appropriate underlying (exposition-only) data-members of {{rlp|iterator}}.

Let
{{lti|cpp/ranges/chunk_by_view/helpers#find_next|find-next}} and
{{lti|cpp/ranges/chunk_by_view/helpers#find_prev|find-prev}} be
appropriate (exposition-only) member functions of {{lc|ranges::chunk_by_view}}.

@1@ Equivalent to:
{{source|1=
current_ = next_;
next_ = parent_-&gt;/*find-next*/(current_);
return *this;
}}

@@ The behavior is undefined if before the call to this operator {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} is equal to {{rlpi|/#Data members|next_}}.

@2@ Equivalent to: {{c|1=auto tmp = *this; ++*this; return tmp;}}

@3@ Equivalent to:
{{source|1=
next_ = current_;
current_ = parent_-&gt;/*find-prev*/(next_);
return *this;
}}

@4@ Equivalent to: {{c|1=auto tmp = *this; --*this; return tmp;}}

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1,3@ {{c|*this}}
@2,4@ a copy of {{c|*this}} that was made before the change.
